SELECT
STK_ID , CASE WHEN IS_CTRL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END CONTROL , NVL(DISCONTINUE,0) DISCONTINUED , STK_CODE , STK_DESC , TO_CHAR(CTRL_START_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') START_DATE , TO_CHAR(CTRL_START_DT,'HH:MI AM') START_TIME , TO_CHAR(CTRL_END_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') END_DATE , TO_CHAR(CTRL_END_DT,'HH:MI AM') END_TIME
FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_TYPE_ID = 61
AND IS_CTRL = #{cmbControl}
AND UPPER(STK_CODE) LIKE '%'|| #{productCode} ||'%'
AND UPPER(STK_DESC) LIKE '%'|| #{productName} ||'%'
AND TO_DATE( #{effectDt} || #{effectTm} ,'DD/MM/YYYYHH:MI AM') BETWEEN CTRL_START_DT AND CTRL_END_DT
AND TO_DATE( #{effectDt} ,'DD/MM/YYYY') BETWEEN CTRL_START_DT AND CTRL_END_DT
AND STK_ID = #{stkId}
ORDER BY STK_CTGRY_ID, STK_ID, STK_DESC

SELECT
STK_ID, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, SRV_PAC_ID, APP_TYPE
FROM ( SELECT T1.STK_ID, T1.STK_CODE, T1.STK_DESC, T2.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID SRV_PAC_ID, 66 APP_TYPE FROM SYS0026M T1 JOIN SAL0082D T2 ON T2.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID = T1.STK_ID AND T2.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 WHERE T1.STK_TYPE_ID = 61 AND T1.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND (T1.DISCONTINUE = 1 OR T2.DISCONTINUE = 1) UNION SELECT T1.STK_ID, T1.STK_CODE, T1.STK_DESC, T2.SRV_MEM_PAC_ID SRV_PAC_ID, 67 APP_TYPE FROM SYS0026M T1 JOIN SAL0092M T2 ON T2.SRV_MEM_ITM_STK_ID = T1.STK_ID AND T2.SRV_MEM_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 WHERE T1.STK_TYPE_ID = 61 AND T1.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND (T1.DISCONTINUE = 1 OR T2.DISCONTINUE = 1) ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND APP_TYPE = #{appTypeId} AND SRV_PAC_ID = #{pacId} AND STK_ID = #{stkId}

WITH SOM AS( SELECT SOM.SALES_ORD_ID, SOM.PROMO_ID, SOD.ITM_STK_ID,SOM.SALES_DT, SOM.STUS_CODE_ID FROM SAL0001D SOM JOIN SAL0002D SOD ON SOD.SALES_ORD_ID = SOM.SALES_ORD_ID WHERE SOM.STUS_CODE_ID NOT IN (8,10) AND NVL(SOM.PRE_ORD_ID,0) = 0 ) SELECT STK_ID , PROMO_ID , CTRL_QUOTA , EKEYIN_COUNT , ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT , EKEYIN_COUNT + ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT TOT2 FROM ( SELECT S.STK_ID , PD.PROMO_ID , PD.CTRL_QUOTA , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAL0213M EKEY WHERE EKEY.ITM_STK_ID = S.STK_ID AND EKEY.PROMO_ID = PD.PROMO_ID AND EKEY.REQST_DT BETWEEN S.CTRL_START_DT AND S.CTRL_END_DT AND EKEY.STUS_ID NOT IN (8,10)) EKEYIN_COUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SOM WHERE SOM.ITM_STK_ID = S.STK_ID AND SOM.PROMO_ID = PD.PROMO_ID AND SOM.SALES_DT BETWEEN S.CTRL_START_DT AND S.CTRL_END_DT AND SOM.STUS_CODE_ID NOT IN (8,10) ) ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT FROM SYS0026M S JOIN SAL0018D PD ON PD.PROMO_ITM_STK_ID = S.STK_ID WHERE S.STK_ID = #{stkId} AND PD.PROMO_ID = #{promoId} AND S.IS_CTRL = 1 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN CTRL_START_DT AND CTRL_END_DT AND PD.CTRL_FLAG = 1 ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND (EKEYIN_COUNT + ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT) > CTRL_QUOTA
AND (EKEYIN_COUNT + ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT) +1 > CTRL_QUOTA
